meta.title: Eduard Gagite — Backend Engineer (Go)
meta.description: Personal site: info, contacts, and educational materials.

materials.note: I create educational materials for backend engineers — concise cheatsheets and notes.

hero.name: Eduard Gagite Stanislavovich
hero.bio:
I am a backend engineer focused on building high‑load, scalable services in Go. I design distributed systems with emphasis on efficiency, observability, and strong engineering practices.

I build server applications, integrations and APIs, work with event‑driven architectures (Kafka, RabbitMQ), and rely on Docker and CI/CD. I prefer clean, structured code based on SOLID principles and Go industry best practices.

I work with microservices, asynchronous queues, real‑time communication (gRPC, WebSocket), and optimize performance and infrastructure.

I continuously learn and explore tools and patterns, and develop side projects. I studied at Sberbank's "School 21" — intensive hands‑on training, algorithms, systems thinking, and teamwork.

promo.title: I create educational materials for backend engineers
